mapper.update: update db_taskstatusconfig set NODEID = #{nodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NODENAME' = #{nodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXTNODEID = #{nextnodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXTNODENAME = #{nextnodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIRECT = #{direct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, NODEID, 'NODENAME', NEXTNODEID, NEXTNODENAME, DIRECT, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, STYPE from db_taskstatusconfig where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, NODEID, 'NODENAME', NEXTNODEID, NEXTNODENAME, DIRECT, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, STYPE from db_taskstatusconfig
